column6: A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’ or `[1,0]` for On/Off).

column2: Full Width at Half Maximum of the Gaussian kernel used during spatial smoothing.
Run smoothing before or after z-scoring.
Determines format of outputs. 0 will produce non-z-scored outputs, 1 will produce z-scores of outputs.
column3: A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’ or `[1,0]` for On/Off).
